dmca.title: Hockey Night Takedown Notice
dmca.body:
[redacted]:


Your website (Thursday, April 25, 2002) points to a link where people can download the "Hockey Night In Canada Theme". The owner of that sight does not have our permission to do so and we have insisted that he immediately cease and desist.

We would ask that you do not encourage this type of copyright infringement and remove the link from your site.

Please do not hesitate to contact me should you require further information.

Best regards,
[Private]
--
President
Copyright Music & Visuals
(a division of Absolute Productions Inc.)
---
Web: www.copyrightmv.com
Hockey Night In Canada Theme: www.hockeytheme.com
dmca.principal_name: Copyright Music & Visuals, a division of Absolute Productions Inc.
